about_the_game:
Purchase this DLC to get early access to Operation: Overlord, our third free content update for Operation: Harsh Doorstop. The Operation: Overlord development team is supported by funds raised from the sale of this DLC.

With this DLC, you get early access to maps, weapons, and other content developed for this update. After the update is completed, it will be released for free to the community as part of the base Operation: Harsh Doorstop game. This DLC includes an in-game emblem showing players as supporters of Operation: Overlord. Anyone wishing to receive the emblem must purchase this DLC before the update is complete.

Thanks to your support, we are able to create free content such as this. The Operation: Overlord update would not be possible without supporting members like yourself! Each free update to Operation: Harsh Doorstop provides benefits to the entire community, and these limited early access periods are the perfect way for us to reward our supporting members.

See you on the battlefield soon!

name: Operation: Overlord (World War II) Campaign

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Operation: Overlord (World War II) Campaign - $14.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Operation: Overlord (World War II) Campaign

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R9 270X (or equivalent with at least 2 GB of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Operation: Overlord includes new weapons, maps, and content featuring World War II, and will be released for free upon completion. By donating to receive early access to the Operation: Overlord update, you are helping support continued free content updates for Operation: Harsh Doorstop.
